
list(APPEND CMAKE_ARGS "-DWITH_GFLAGS=OFF")
list(APPEND CMAKE_ARGS "-DBUILD_TESTING=OFF")

ExternalProject_Add(
  glog
  GIT_REPOSITORY "${glog_URL}"
  GIT_TAG "${glog_TAG}"
  UPDATE_COMMAND ""
  PATCH_COMMAND ""
  SOURCE_DIR "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/glog"
  CMAKE_ARGS ${CMAKE_ARGS}
  TEST_COMMAND ""
  LIST_SEPARATOR |
)
